head.name: Русский
head.provider: Russian translation provided by Andrey aka andrey_brest

info.src: You need to restart to make the language settings take effect!

head.info: Перезапустите программу, чтобы настройки вступили в силу!

item.src: Cannot keep up with this sample rate.

vis.item: Cannot keep up with this sample rate.

item.src: Clear settings when the software starts next time
Even if the trigger is not met
It's the latest version, no updates required.

vis.item: Вы используете последнюю версию программы. Обновление не требуется.

item.src: Keep exactly the same position as before (if possible)
Keep settings when the software starts next time
Only use the computer's memory to store the sampled data, the data is uploaded in real time.
Only when the trigger is met
Place this setting on the toolbar.

vis.item: Поместите этот параметр на панель инструментов.

item.src: Please click the link below to download.

vis.item: Please click the link below to download.

item.src: Please enter an integer in the range
Please select at least one channel.

vis.item: Please select at least one channel.

item.src: Please try to reduce the sample rate.

vis.item: Please try to reduce the sample rate.

item.src: Quitting can lead to unpredictable errors.

vis.item: Quitting can lead to unpredictable errors.

item.src: Show time zero, with previous zoom level

vis.item: Show time zero, with previous zoom level

item.src: Sorry, timing marker pairs has reached the maximum number.

vis.item: Sorry, timing marker pairs has reached the maximum number.

item.src: Sorry, there is no measurable data.

vis.item: Sorry, there is no measurable data.

item.src: Sorry, there is no data that can be exported.
Sorry, there is no data that can be saved.
The effective range of threshold voltage is

vis.item: The effective range of threshold voltage is

item.src: The effective range of PWM:[0.1Hz,20MHz], duty cycle:[0,1].

vis.item: The effective range of PWM:[0.1Hz,20MHz], duty cycle:[0,1].

item.src: This mode can provide higher sample rate.
This mode can provide larger sample depth.

vis.item: The update is not complete.Time Select

item.src: Use the device's memory as the sample buffer, the data is uploaded to computer after sampled.
When a channel is checked, pulses less than the set width will be filtered out.
You may need to install a PDF reader to open the user guide.

vis.item: Возможно, вам придется установить PDF-ридер, чтобы открыть руководство пользователя.

item.src: The analyzer will only operate at high speed overdrive mode.

analyzers.item: The analyzer will only operate at high speed overdrive mode.

Use this option when recording CAN High directly

analyzers.item: SDA and SCL can't be assigned to the same input.

analyzers.item: Specify if data comes in MSB first, or LSB first.

item.src: FRAME signal transitions (changes state) twice each word.

analyzers.item: FRAME signal transitions (changes state) twice each word.

item.src: FRAME signal transitions (changes state) once each word. (I2S, PCM standard)

analyzers.item: FRAME signal transitions (changes state) once each word. (I2S, PCM standard)

item.src: FRAME signal transitions(changes state) twice every four (4) words.

analyzers.item: FRAME signal transitions(changes state) twice every four (4) words.

item.src: Specify whether data bits are left or right aligned wrt FRAME edges. Only needed if more bits are sent than needed each frame, and additional bits are ignored.

analyzers.item: Specify whether data bits are left or right aligned wrt FRAME edges. Only needed if more bits are sent than needed each frame, and additional bits are ignored.

item.src: Specify the bit rate in bits per second.
Automatically find the minimum pulse width and calculate the baud rate according to this pulse width.
